```{r functions}
mbsize <- function(path) format(round(file.info(path)$size/1000000, 2), nsmall=2)
kbsize <- function(path) format(round(file.info(path)$size/1000, 2), nsmall=2)
```

# Count Data

```{r openalex-raw-data}
oa_venue <- jsonlite::read_json("https://api.openalex.org/journals/V4210226185?mailto=bibliometrie@slub-dresden.de")
```

```{r crossref-raw-data}
cr_journal <- jsonlite::read_json("https://api.crossref.org/journals/2150-8097?mailto=bibliometrie@slub-dresden.de")
```

## Works

```{r crossref-works-count-data}
cr_works_count_by_year <- do.call("rbind", lapply(cr_journal$message$breakdowns$`dois-by-issued-year`, function(x) data.frame(year=x[[1]], count=as.integer(x[[2]]))))
```

```{r crossref-works-count-plot}
ggplot2::ggplot(cr_works_count_by_year, ggplot2::aes(year, count)) + ggplot2::geom_col() + ggplot2::scale_x_continuous(breaks=rev(cr_works_count_by_year$year)) + ggplot2::ggtitle("PVLDB Works Count (Crossref)") + ggplot2::xlab("") + ggplot2::ylab("")
```

```{r openalex-works-count-data}
oa_works_count_by_year <- do.call("rbind", lapply(oa_venue$counts_by_year, function(x) data.frame(year=x$year, count=as.integer(x$works_count))))
```

```{r openalex-works-count-plot}
ggplot2::ggplot(oa_works_count_by_year, ggplot2::aes(year, count)) + ggplot2::geom_col() + ggplot2::scale_x_continuous(breaks=rev(oa_works_count_by_year$year)) + ggplot2::ggtitle("PVLDB Works Count (OpenAlex)") + ggplot2::xlab("") + ggplot2::ylab("")
```

## Citations

```{r openalex-citations-count-data}
oa_citation_count_by_year <- do.call("rbind", lapply(oa_venue$counts_by_year, function(x) data.frame(year=x$year, count=as.integer(x$cited_by_count))))
```

```{r openalex-citations-count-plot}
ggplot2::ggplot(oa_citation_count_by_year, ggplot2::aes(year, count)) + ggplot2::geom_col() + ggplot2::scale_x_continuous(breaks=rev(oa_citation_count_by_year$year)) + ggplot2::ggtitle("PVLDB Citations Count (OpenAlex)") + ggplot2::xlab("") + ggplot2::ylab("")
```

```{r jcr-citations-count-data}
jcr_citation_count_by_year <- data.frame(year=c(2019, 2020, 2021), count=c(7166, 7198, 10242))
```

```{r jcr-citations-count-plot}
ggplot2::ggplot(jcr_citation_count_by_year, ggplot2::aes(year, count)) + ggplot2::geom_col() + ggplot2::scale_x_continuous(breaks=rev(jcr_citation_count_by_year$year)) + ggplot2::ggtitle("PVLDB Citations Count (2021 Journal Citation Reports Â© Clarivate, 2022)") + ggplot2::xlab("") + ggplot2::ylab("")
```
